title: New Real-Money Wallet and Trading Accounts (request)
description: Create a new account real-money wallet and trading accounts

accept_risk.description: Show whether client has accepted risk disclaimer.

account_opening_reason.description: [Optional] Purpose and reason for requesting the account opening.

account_type.description: To set the wallets type - only doughflow and crptyo wallets are allowed for initial phase, other types will be added later

address_postcode.description: [Optional] Within 20 characters and may not contain '+'.

calling_country_code.description: [Optional] The phone's calling country code. Don't include the `+` sign. Up to 4 digits.

citizen.description: [Optional] Country of legal citizenship, 2-letter country code. Possible value receive from `residence_list` call.

client_type.description: [Optional] Indicates whether this is for a client requesting an account with professional status.

currency.description: To set currency of the account. List of supported currencies can be acquired with `payout_currencies` call.

.*.description: Any property with a non-empty string value

first_name.description: [Optional] Within 1-50 characters, use only letters, spaces, hyphens, full-stops or apostrophes.

landing_company_short.description: [Optional] Set the landing company of the wallet. Default value is 'svg' if company not provided

last_name.description: [Optional] Within 1-50 characters, use only letters, spaces, hyphens, full-stops or apostrophes.

non_pep_declaration.description: [Optional] Indicates client's self-declaration of not being a PEP/RCA (Politically Exposed Person/Relatives and Close Associates).

phone.description: [Optional] The phone's national format, don't include the `+` sign nor the calling country code. Up to 15 digits are allowed.

residence.description: 2-letter country code, possible value receive from `residence_list` call.

resident_self_declaration.description: [Optional] Indicates client's self declaration for opening account under own initiative, must be 1

salutation.description: Accept any value in enum list.

tax_identification_number.description: Tax identification number. Only applicable for real money account. Required for `maltainvest` landing company.

tax_residence.description: Residence for tax purpose. Comma separated iso country code if multiple jurisdictions. Only applicable for real money account. Required for `maltainvest` landing company.

tin_skipped.description: [Optional] Whether the client has skipped the TIN form. Only applicable for real money account.

tnc_acceptance.description: The tnc acceptance status of the user.

loginid.description: [Optional] The login id of the user. Mandatory when multiple tokens were provided during authorize.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
